title: FiveThirtyEight joins ABC News - ABC News
snippet: ABC News announced today it has reached an agreement in principle to acquire the renowned data journalism organization FiveThirtyEight from ESPN.

title: Publishers Daily: ABC News Buys 'FiveThirtyEight'
snippet: FiveThirtyEight was purchased by ESPN in 2013. The site's traffic grew from 3.6 million unique visitors in March 2015 to 11.5 million a year later, thanks to the fever surrounding the 2016 presidential election.

title: ABC News Takes Over Nate Silverâ€™s FiveThirtyEight
snippet: ESPN will eighty-six FiveThirtyEight, the statistics-driven news-and-analysis site led by Nate Silver. But the news outlet will go back to square one at ABC News.

title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: In April 2018, it was announced that FiveThirtyEight would be transferred to ABC News from ESPN, Inc., majority owned by The Walt Disney Company. ABC News Live streaming channel was launched on Roku in May 2019.

title: ABC News Acquires FiveThirtyEight | Mergr M&A Deal Summary
snippet: On April 18, 2018, ABC News acquired digital media company FiveThirtyEight from ESPN
